I must stress the team's work especially on the js side is paramount for web freedom as a whole. They have been working deeply with browser vendors to fix webrtc & webtransport bugs to ensure that the browser is the last bastion of p2p freedom. actaully lt does, because lf you borrow an asset and short it, lf mm or other people long, you get liquiaded and suffer a great loss. However lf you control decent amount of supply, once price increase, you can supply short sold tokens from your own tokens.

IF token price decrease - you compansate from market means you are in profit selling customer tokens higher price.
if token price increase - you compansate  from your tokens means you are in profit in terms of USDt.

Overall, in both case you are in profit in USDt value.
